results.title: Overcoming acquired resistance to PD-1 inhibitor with the addition of metformin in small cell lung cancer (SCLC).
results.text_hl: Overcoming acquired resistance to PD-1 inhibitor with the addition of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Small_Cell_Lung_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055752 @@@small cell lung cancer@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Small_Cell_Lung_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055752 @@@SCLC@@@).

results.title: Metformin improves survival in patients with concurrent diabetes and small cell lung cancer: a meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To compare survival outcome among the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with concurrent @<m>DISEASE_Small_Cell_Lung_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055752 @@@small cell lung cancer@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Small_Cell_Lung_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055752 @@@SCLC@@@) and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@) using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or without @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Fan H, Bai S, Guan X, Ma W, Fu Y, Zhang X, Deng L, Tian J. Metformin improves survival in patients with concurrent diabetes and small cell lung cancer: a meta-analysis. Minerva Endocrinol (Torino). 2021 Mar 16;():. PMID: 33759443

results.title: The effect of metformin on lung cancer risk and survival in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus: A meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: In the subgroup analysis by histology, a protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @DISEASE_Lung_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D008175 @@@lung cancer@@@ survival was observed in both @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Non_Small_Cell_Lung @DISEASE_MESH:D002289 @@@non-small-cell lung cancer@@@ (HR 0.68; 95% CI 0.54-0.84) and @<m>DISEASE_Small_Cell_Lung_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055752 @@@small-cell lung cancer@@@ (HR 0.52; 95% CI 0.39-0.69).

citations.NLM: Xiao K, Liu F, Liu J, Xu J, Wu Q, Li X. The effect of metformin on lung cancer risk and survival in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus: A meta-analysis. J Clin Pharm Ther. 2020 Aug;45(4):783-792. PMID: 32406122

results.title: Effect of metformin in the prognosis of patients with smallcell lung cancer combined with diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: There was a trend toward prolonged MST in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Small_Cell_Lung_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055752 @@@LD SCLC@@@ using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ compared with those who did not use @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (58 vs 29 months; p = 0.084).

results.title: Metformin therapy associated with survival benefit in lung cancer patients with diabetes
results.text_hl: Xu et al. also observed a beneficial survival of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use in @<m>DISEASE_Small_Cell_Lung_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055752 @@@small cell lung cancer@@@(@DISEASE_Carcinoma_Small_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D018288 @@@SCLC@@@) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.
